Class SMSRelay

java.lang.Object
  javax.microedition.midlet.MIDlet
      SMSRelay
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, javax.microedition.lcdui.CommandListener
public class SMSRelay
extends javax.microedition.midlet.MIDlet
implements java.lang.Runnable, javax.microedition.lcdui.CommandListener

J2ME MIDlet class. Deployable as an application onto a CLDC mobile device. This is the SMS Relay class, which should be deployed and executed on the device which is acting as the SMS relay. This class continuously listens for SMS connections.
